a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Foreign aid given by sector, DAC countries

Committed bilateral
official development assistance (ODA)
. This data is expressed in US dollars and adjusted
Note: This data is expressed in constant 2022 US$.
